name: GiveCampus
headline: The fundraising platform for schools.
description: GiveCampus is the world's #1 fundraising platform for non-profit educational institutions. Trusted by millions of donors and more than 1,300 colleges, universities, and K-12 schools, our mission is to advance the quality, the affordability, and the accessibility of education. We provide software, services, and expertise that help schools raise more money, from more people, at a fraction of the cost of other fundraising methods. Since 2015, our platform has facilitated more than $6 billion in charitable giving.

# Fuel more futures with GiveCampus
Raise more dollars with a comprehensive platform that helps you identify, qualify, cultivate, solicit, and steward—all from the same place.
[Schedule a Demo](http://go.givecampus.com/<https:/info.givecampus.com/schedule?utm_source=website&utm_medium=wordpress&utm_campaign=homepage&utm_content=demo-landing-page>)
![Girl against blue background](https://go.givecampus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Fuel-More-Futures-with-GiveCampus-100.png)
![GC Outreach user interface displaying how to generate an email wiusing AI.](https://go.givecampus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Homepage_ValueProp.png)
Introducing GC Outreach 
## Now you can email constituents right from within GiveCampus
Easier email outreach is just a few clicks away. Build and send beautifully branded emails to smartly segmented lists from wherever you are in GiveCampus—whether you’re launching a giving form, running a social fundraising campaign, or planning a reunion event. No more cutting and pasting, and toggling between tools. No more importing and exporting. No more spamming donors who have already made a gift. Just click … click … click … DONE!
[Get the skinny on GC Outreach](http://go.givecampus.com/<https:/info.givecampus.com/hubfs/GC%20Outreach_Digital.pdf>)
## Since 2015, 1,500+ educational institutions have raised more than $6 billion on GiveCampus

## GiveCampus curious, but not quite ready to chat?
We get it. Our 45-minute twice monthly Drop-In Demo is for you. It’s your chance to see GiveCampus in action and get answers to your questions (off screen, in chat, and in relative anonymity 🥸). 
[Register now](http://go.givecampus.com/<https:/info.givecampus.com/drop-in-demo-registration>)
![GiveCampus Bi-Monthly Drop-In Demo happens every first and third Thursday of the month at 12:30 ET.](https://go.givecampus.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Bi-Monthly-Drop-In-Demo.png)
## Switching to GiveCampus is easier than you think …

Introducing GC Outreach 
## Now you can email constituents right from within GiveCampus
Easier email outreach is just a few clicks away. Build and send beautifully branded emails to smartly segmented lists from wherever you are in GiveCampus—whether you’re launching a giving form, running a social fundraising campaign, or planning a reunion event. No more cutting and pasting, and toggling between tools. No more importing and exporting. No more spamming donors who have already made a gift. Just click … click … click … DONE!

generated_description:
GiveCampus is making waves in the educational fundraising space as the undisputed leader in a rapidly evolving market. Founded in 2014 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S15, GiveCampus started with a mission: to provide schools with a powerful fundraising platform that enhances the quality, accessibility, and affordability of education. This mission resonates deeply as they’ve successfully facilitated over $6 billion in charitable giving to more than 1,300 educational institutions since 2015.

Located in the heart of Washington, DC, GiveCampus boasts a dedicated team of 105 employees, driven by their commitment to revolutionizing how schools fund their initiatives. Michael Seibel, a well-respected figure in the startup ecosystem, serves as their Group Partner at Y Combinator, lending invaluable experience and mentorship. 

The platform is designed for efficiency and effectiveness, deploying innovative software solutions that allow schools to raise more money with fewer resources. It caters to a range of needs with solutions like Everyday Online Giving, Crowdfunding, Wealth Data Insights, and Volunteer Management. 

GiveCampus is also tapping into modern technologies, including artificial intelligence, mobile wallets, and even cryptocurrency payment options to meet donors where they are. Their aim is to streamline processes, improve donor engagement, and ultimately increase fundraising success.

They offer features such as analyzed reporting and donor behavior predictions, ensuring that schools can target their fundraising strategies effectively. Moreover, with accolades for being user-friendly and the high satisfaction levels of their client base, it’s clear that GiveCampus excels not just in technology but also in customer support.

If you want a deeper dive into their offerings or are interested in elevating your school's fundraising efforts, check out [GiveCampus](http://go.givecampus.com) and see why they are paving the way in educational fundraising.
